lines.text: Preacher likes to set fire to churches, that's his trip. Unfortunately he does it when there are people inside.
I told him that if he does not stop this nonsense immediately, I shall hang him up by his heels and chop him in half.
There are no crazy people, doctor, we're all just on vacation.
So... it's not just us crazy folk that kill. We all kill... when we must. And we all die... when it's time.
What are you, some kind of asshole?
Vengeance is mine, says the Lord!
Mind moving fast is crazy. Mind slow is sane. Mind stopped... is God.
Why don't you come out, and we can explore a few things together?
